title: Crock Pot Grain Free Low Carb Granola
directions: Turn Crock Pot to high and add coconut oil and allow it to melt.
Once melted add vanilla extract and stevia.
Stir well before adding nuts, seeds and coconut.
Stir the granola mixture well to make sure all is coated.
Whisk Swerve, cinnamon and salt together then sprinkle over the nut and seed mixture.
Cover and cook on high 2 hours.
Pour and spread out onto a baking pan to cool.
Keep stored in a covered container.
ingredients: 2 cups raw almonds, walnuts, pecans, hazelnuts (1/2 cup each)
2 cups raw sunflower seeds and pumpkin seeds (1 cup each)
1/2 cup granulated Swerve sweetener or other sugar free sub of choice
